entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
